@graph.name: Variant Tagger & Image Matcher Tutorial
@graph.description: Learn how to implement and use OptizenAI's Variant Tagger and Image Matcher features to automatically organize product variants and match variant images for improved product pages.

about.name: Product Variant Management
about.description: Automated organization and image matching for ecommerce product variants

@graph.transcript: This tutorial covers the Variant Tagger and Image Matcher features in OptizenAI. We'll show you how to automatically organize product variants and match images to improve your ecommerce product pages.

@graph.headline: Variant Tagger & Image Matcher - OptizenAI Enterprise Features
@graph.description: Complete guide to implementing OptizenAI's Variant Tagger and Image Matcher features for automatic product variant organization and image matching.

@graph.name: How to Use Variant Tagger & Image Matcher
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to implementing and using OptizenAI's Variant Tagger and Image Matcher features for product variant management.

step.name: Access Enterprise Features
step.text: Navigate to the OptizenAI dashboard and access the Enterprise features section.

step.name: Enable Variant Tagger
step.text: Locate and enable the Variant Tagger feature in your OptizenAI settings.

step.name: Configure Tagging Rules
step.text: Set up automatic tagging rules based on product attributes like size, color, and material.

step.name: Set Up Image Matcher
step.text: Configure the Image Matcher to automatically associate variant images with corresponding product variants.

step.name: Test and Optimize
step.text: Run tests on your product catalog and optimize the matching algorithms for better accuracy.

@graph.name: Variant Tagger & Image Matcher Learning Resource
@graph.description: Comprehensive learning resource for mastering OptizenAI's variant management features.

mainEntity.name: What are the Variant Tagger and Image Matcher features?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Variant Tagger and Image Matcher are Enterprise features in OptizenAI that automatically organize product variants and match variant images to improve product page structure and SEO performance.

mainEntity.name: Do I need an Enterprise subscription to use these features?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, the Variant Tagger and Image Matcher are exclusive Enterprise features that require an OptizenAI Enterprise subscription to access and use.

mainEntity.name: How accurate is the automatic image matching?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Image Matcher uses advanced AI algorithms to achieve high accuracy in matching variant images. The system continuously learns and improves its matching capabilities based on your product catalog.

mainEntity.name: Can I customize the tagging rules?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, you can fully customize tagging rules based on your specific product attributes, categories, and business requirements. The system supports complex rule configurations for maximum flexibility.

mainEntity.name: What types of product variants are supported?

acceptedAnswer.text: The system supports all common variant types including size, color, material, style, pattern, and custom attributes. It can handle complex multi-dimensional variant structures.

offers.name: Enterprise Plan
offers.description: Full access to Variant Tagger and Image Matcher features

@graph.name: OptizenAI Documentation Series
@graph.description: Complete documentation series for OptizenAI features and functionality

hasDefinedTerm.name: Variant Tagger
hasDefinedTerm.description: An automated system that organizes and tags product variants based on configurable rules and attributes.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Image Matcher
hasDefinedTerm.description: AI-powered feature that automatically matches product images to their corresponding variants based on visual analysis.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Product Variant
hasDefinedTerm.description: Different versions of a product that share the same base item but differ in attributes like size, color, or material.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Enterprise Features
hasDefinedTerm.description: Advanced OptizenAI capabilities available only to Enterprise subscription users.
